column2: Aberdeen Global Dynamic Dividend Fund (the Fund), formerly Alpine Global Dynamic Dividend Fund, is a diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Fund's investment objective is to seek high current dividend income. It is also focuses on long-term growth of capital as a secondary investment objective. It holds investments in various sectors, such as aerospace and defense, air freight and logistics, airlines, auto components, banks, beverages, biotechnology, chemicals, commercial services and supplies, electric utilities, communications equipment, construction and engineering, consumer finance, diversified telecommunication services, energy equipment and services, food and staples retailing, food products, gas utilities, healthcare equipment and supplies, household durables and media. It is managed by Aberdeen Standard Investments.
